0010111011000010 0000001100010100 0 -> sum: 0011000111010110, cout: 0
0000101010101100 1111010110101100 1 -> sum: 0000000001011001, cout: 1

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
